title: Regina Shotaro
text:
Regina Shotaro (born September 10, 1981) is one of the first athletes from the Federated States of <a href="Micronesia">Micronesia</a> to participate in the <a href="Olympic%20Games">Olympic Games</a>, in this case the <a href="2000%20Summer%20Olympics">2000 Summer Olympics</a> in Sydney, Australia.
After a career as a <a href="100%20metres">100 metres</a> runner in the Federated States of Micronesia, Regina pursued her education in the United States at <a href="Lansing%20Community%20College">Lansing Community College</a> in <a href="Lansing%2C%20Michigan">Lansing, Michigan</a>. Regina is of <a href="Japanese%20people">Japanese</a> descent, and currently resides in Lansing Michigan.
